mapper.insert: INSERT INTO healthrecord (record_no, record_date, record_con, user_no) VALUES (healthrecord_seq.nextval, to_char(systimestamp, 'yyyy"년 "mm"월 "dd"일" hh:mm:ss'), #{recordCon}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT weight, height FROM body_info WHERE body_no IN(SELECT max(body_no) FROM body_info WHERE user_no=#{userno })
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dgmagotchi (dgma_no, dgma_stata, dgma_statb, dgma_statc, dgma_statd, dgma_exp, user_no) VALUES (dgmagotchi_seq.nextval, 100, 100, 100, 0, 0, #{userno})
mapper.update: UPDATE dgmagotchi SET dgma_stata=#{dgmaStata}, dgma_statb=#{dgmaStatb}, dgma_statc=#{dgmaStatc}, dgma_statd=#{dgmaStatd}, dgma_exp=#{dgmaExp} WHERE dgma_no = #{dgmaNo}
